about_the_game:
Nuts About Nuts is a lively and cooperative “stress-free” factory simulation game where teamwork and precision are the keys to success.

In this fun and fast-paced experience, players can team up to run a bustling factory floor, selecting specialized tools and using their unique skills to manufacture and deliver increasingly complex parts.

As you work together or alone, the goal is to keep the assembly line moving efficiently while ensuring your friends stay in sync.

The more parts you successfully create and deliver, the more money you earn, enabling you to progress through your company's journey.

·         Create your own manufacturing company

·         A variety of machines and equipment to

          unlock, buy, and use in your factory

·         Automate your production

·         Custom layout for your factory

·         Personalize your company and

          your co-op team

·         Character customization system

·         Purchase a variety of perks to boost

          your speed and progress

·         Buy factory buildings to manufacture

          different parts that earn you more money

Perfect for casual and dedicated gamers, Nuts About Nuts combines the challenges of machining and manufacturing with a playful and engaging atmosphere. With its vibrant art style and dynamic gameplay, the factory floor becomes your playground as you master the art of crafting and delivering the perfect product. Whether working with a group of friends or alone, you’ll need coordination, quick thinking, and a solid plan to keep things running smoothly. Get ready to dive into a world of industrial fun and see just how “nuts” you can get in this entertaining cooperative adventure!
detailed_description:
Nuts About Nuts is a lively and cooperative “stress-free” factory simulation game where teamwork and precision are the keys to success.

In this fun and fast-paced experience, players can team up to run a bustling factory floor, selecting specialized tools and using their unique skills to manufacture and deliver increasingly complex parts.

As you work together or alone, the goal is to keep the assembly line moving efficiently while ensuring your friends stay in sync.

The more parts you successfully create and deliver, the more money you earn, enabling you to progress through your company's journey.

·         Create your own manufacturing company

·         A variety of machines and equipment to

          unlock, buy, and use in your factory

·         Automate your production

·         Custom layout for your factory

·         Personalize your company and

          your co-op team

·         Character customization system

·         Purchase a variety of perks to boost

          your speed and progress

·         Buy factory buildings to manufacture

          different parts that earn you more money

Perfect for casual and dedicated gamers, Nuts About Nuts combines the challenges of machining and manufacturing with a playful and engaging atmosphere. With its vibrant art style and dynamic gameplay, the factory floor becomes your playground as you master the art of crafting and delivering the perfect product. Whether working with a group of friends or alone, you’ll need coordination, quick thinking, and a solid plan to keep things running smoothly. Get ready to dive into a world of industrial fun and see just how “nuts” you can get in this entertaining cooperative adventure!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mint 18 / Ubuntu 16.04.01
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI FireGL T2-128
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Sierra - 10.12.6
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4400E
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Nuts About Nuts

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DEDICATED VIDEO RAM: 1024 MB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-650 / AMD A10-5800K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon HD 7510
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DEDICATED VIDEO RAM: 1024 MB

short_description: Nuts About Nuts is a single-player and co-op factory sim where you partner up, pick your tools, and let the factory floor become your playground. Use your skills, to manufacture and deliver complex parts to keep the assembly line moving and your friends in sync.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
